system.description:
Shields is the skill used to operate shield for blocking incoming attacks or other hazardous effects. Shields act as a second layer of armor decreasing incoming damage for the cost of damaging themselves upon successful block. See "Protection damage (REUP P94)".

Shields can be used to bring up shield — a “reaction skill” — to block enemy melee, brawling or ranged attack in two ways:

  • Opposite Shields roll simlar to Parry.
  • Roll Shield Protection dice and add result to an attack difficulty. (This roll can't be affected by character or fate points)
